song.englishname: A Film Lover's Guide To A Romantic Horror

english.segment1: These leaves fall as the trees burn to ashes. Another moment of second guessing. Interpretations. Every sentence. Every word. Every gasping cry. You, I, who, we die.
english.segment2: I'm sorry darling because love will soon be dying.
english.segment3: Your eyes. A bitterness of few disguise. Nothing better configured than you here with me. So thanks for your assistance on the new flesh wound. These tulips do catch up as I die for you.
english.segment4: My Heart. You Hand. This love. The end.
english.segment5: I'm sorry darling because love will soon be dying
english.segment6: Just hold your breath. Breathing is easier when you're not conscious
